titleStmt.title: A journal of the expedition of Monsieur de La Fueillade for the relief of Candy written in French (by way of letter) by a gentleman who was a voluntiere in that service, and faithfully Englished.
Journal de l'expédition de Monsieur de la Fueillade, pour le secours de Candie. English
titleStmt.author: Volontaire.

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Journal de l'expedition de Monsieur de la Fueillade, pour le secours de Candie.
"A relation of the siege of Candia" (Wing R868) has special t.p. but pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.

person.persName: La Feuillade, François d'Aubusson, duc de,
